name: Z-Behold my Fearsome Gadget!
effect: At the end of each Round, Deal 1 damage to the foe, and heal the User for 1 HP for every damage dealt this way. The foe will take an additional 1 damage per round(which does not heal Magic) for four rounds. Grass Type Pokemon are immune to this Move. +1 priority.
description: Magic reaches down to their utility belt fanny pack and pulls forth a long braided black wire fitted with several bulbous glowing seeds. Immediately afterwards, Magic slings it forward and allows it to wrap tightly around the foe, leeching their life.
